targets.queryText:
SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value
FROM snapshots
WHERE period_type='YEAR'
ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value
FROM snapshots
WHERE period_type='YEAR'
ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText:
SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value
FROM snapshots
WHERE period_type='YEAR'
ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value
FROM snapshots
WHERE period_type='YEAR'
ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1;

targets.queryText:
WITH recent AS (
  SELECT period_end_date, payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
cur AS (SELECT j FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),
prev_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(prev.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, prev.j AS j FROM prev)SELECT
(
  CAST(
    COALESCE(
      json_extract(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', cur_idx.i)),
      json_extract(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', cur_idx.i))
    ) AS REAL
  )
  -
  CAST(
    COALESCE(
      json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', prev_idx.i)),
      json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', prev_idx.i))
    ) AS REAL
  )
) AS value
FROM cur_idx, prev_idx;
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH recent AS (
  SELECT period_end_date, payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
cur AS (SELECT j FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),
prev_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(prev.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, prev.j AS j FROM prev)SELECT
(
  CAST(
    COALESCE(
      json_extract(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', cur_idx.i)),
      json_extract(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', cur_idx.i))
    ) AS REAL
  )
  -
  CAST(
    COALESCE(
      json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', prev_idx.i)),
      json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', prev_idx.i))
    ) AS REAL
  )
) AS value
FROM cur_idx, prev_idx;

targets.queryText:
WITH recent AS (
  SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date, payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
cur AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),
prev_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(prev.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, prev.j AS j FROM prev)SELECT
 (CAST(json_extract(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].income.projected_monthly_income', cur_idx.i)) AS REAL)
- CAST(json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].income.projected_monthly_income', prev_idx.i)) AS REAL)) AS value
FROM cur_idx, prev_idx;

  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC

),
cur AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),

- CAST(json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].income.forward_12m_total', prev_idx.i)) AS REAL)) AS value
FROM cur_idx, prev_idx;

targets.queryText:
WITH recent AS (
  SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date, payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
cur AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),
prev_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(prev.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, prev.j AS j FROM prev)SELECT
 (CAST(json_extract(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].margin.ltv_pct', cur_idx.i)) AS REAL)
- CAST(json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].margin.ltv_pct', prev_idx.i)) AS REAL)) AS value
FROM cur_idx, prev_idx;
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH recent AS (
  SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date, payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
cur AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),
prev_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(prev.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, prev.j AS j FROM prev)SELECT
 (CAST(json_extract(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].margin.ltv_pct', cur_idx.i)) AS REAL)
- CAST(json_extract(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].margin.ltv_pct', prev_idx.i)) AS REAL)) AS value
FROM cur_idx, prev_idx;

targets.queryText:
WITH recent AS (
  SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date, payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
cur AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),
prev_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(prev.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, prev.j AS j FROM prev), cur_h AS (
  SELECT json_each.value AS v
  FROM cur_idx, json_each(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].holdings', cur_idx.i))
),
prev_h AS (
  SELECT json_each.value AS v
  FROM prev_idx, json_each(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].holdings', prev_idx.i))
),
rows AS (
  SELECT
    json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') AS symbol,
    (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL)) AS mv_delta,
    (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL)) AS weight_delta,
    (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL)) AS income_delta
  FROM cur_h c
  JOIN prev_h p ON json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') = json_extract(p.v,'$.symbol')
)
SELECT * FROM rows
ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC
LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH recent AS (
  SELECT period_start_date, period_end_date, payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='YEAR'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
cur AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1),
prev AS (SELECT j, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM recent ORDER BY period_end_date ASC  LIMIT 1),
cur_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(cur.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, cur.j AS j FROM cur),
prev_idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(prev.j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, prev.j AS j FROM prev), cur_h AS (
  SELECT json_each.value AS v
  FROM cur_idx, json_each(cur_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].holdings', cur_idx.i))
),
prev_h AS (
  SELECT json_each.value AS v
  FROM prev_idx, json_each(prev_idx.j, printf('$.intervals[%d].holdings', prev_idx.i))
),
rows AS (
  SELECT
    json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') AS symbol,
    (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL)) AS mv_delta,
    (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL)) AS weight_delta,
    (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL)) AS income_delta
  FROM cur_h c
  JOIN prev_h p ON json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') = json_extract(p.v,'$.symbol')
)
SELECT * FROM rows
ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC
LIMIT 10;
